name: Glory to the Dark One
description:
The Dark One and his followers raid an ancient dungeon. While the Dark One's body is frail, his mind and soul are blessed, and must be protected at all costs, no matter how many sacrifices it takes.

Beat all the stages, the Dark One must survive!

Controls
WASD/Arrows - Move
W/Up/Ctrl - Jump
Shift/LMB - Switch Character
R - Restart
Esc - Quit to Menu
